categories.name: business_and_economy
categories.title: Business and Economy
categories.description: Access to comprehensive datasets on business registrations, industrial sector policies, and government incentives for trade and investments. Includes insights into economic development strategies and international trade agreements.

categories.name: education
categories.title: Education
categories.description: Detailed open data on educational policies, school funding sources, and educational program evaluations. Provides transparency on government initiatives and reforms in the education sector.

categories.name: environment_and_agriculture
categories.title: Environment and Agriculture
categories.description: Open datasets on environmental protection policies, government-led agricultural projects, and land management practices. Includes data on sustainability initiatives and environmental impact assessments.

categories.name: health
categories.title: Health
categories.description: Public access to health policy documentation, healthcare service audits, and government health campaigns. Includes data on public health initiatives and outcomes of health service evaluations.

categories.name: employment_and_labor
categories.title: Employment and Labor
categories.description: Open data on labor laws, employment programs, and government-led workforce development initiatives. Provides insights into workforce demographics and government efforts in employment regulation and support.

categories.name: government_operations
categories.title: Government Operations
categories.description: Datasets on government procedural manuals, public sector contracts, and transparency reports. Includes spending data linked to specific government projects and initiatives for public scrutiny.

categories.name: mapping_and_geospatial_data
categories.title: Mapping and Geospatial Data
categories.description: Access to national geospatial data resources, including infrastructure projects, land use planning, and environmental conservation areas. Supports public access to critical geographic information systems.

categories.name: social_welfare
categories.title: Social Welfare
categories.description: Open datasets on social program funding, welfare policy implementations, and outcomes of social services. Includes government reports on the efficacy of social support systems.

categories.name: urban_development_and_housing
categories.title: Urban Development and Housing
categories.description: Data on urban development projects, public consultations, and housing policies. Provides transparency in government planning and public infrastructure projects.

categories.name: transport_and_infrastructure
categories.title: Transport and Infrastructure
categories.description: Open data on transport policy, infrastructure development plans, and public transport service evaluations. Includes information on government initiatives to improve national transport systems.

categories.name: tourism
categories.title: Tourism
categories.description: Open datasets on tourism development strategies, visitor management policies, and cultural heritage preservation efforts. Provides insights into government actions to boost tourism while preserving natural and cultural resources.
